announcements.title: Exploratory Project Guide Allotment
announcements.minibody: Dear Students, Please provide your choices of supervisor for your exploratory project in the google form
announcements.body:
Dear Students,
Please provide your choices of supervisor for your exploratory project in the google form. Below is the link to google form:
https://forms.gle/H8Pum42rxWxhGB666 
 The deadline to submit your choices is July 18, 2023.
with regards,
Convener DUGC
Department of Mathematical Sciences,
IIT(BHU) Varanasi - 221005
announcements.author: Dr. Abhash Kr. Jha
